## Introduction

In this document we are going to identify potential doublet cells

## Setup

Set chunk options:

```{r knitr}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  autodep    = TRUE,
  cache      = TRUE,
  cache.path = "cache/doublet",
  dev        = "png",
  echo       = TRUE,
  error      = FALSE,
  message    = FALSE,
  warning    = FALSE
)
```

Load required packages:

```{r}
pacman::p_load(scran)
```

Read experiment data:

```{r}
sce <- readr::read_rds(here::here("data/clustering.Rds"))
```
